results.title: [Effect of cardiovascular drugs on vasodilating endothelial function in animals with experimental deficiency of sex hormones].
results.text_hl: The influence of various cardiovascular drugs, including ACE inhibitors (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@), beta-adrenoblockers (@CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@), calcium inhibitors (@CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@), @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-lowering drugs (@CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@), and @CHEMICAL_Heparinoids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006496 @@@heparinoids@@@ (@CHEMICAL_glucuronyl_glucosamine_glycan_sulfate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C007858 @@@sulodexide@@@), on the vasodilating endothelial function has been studied in animals with experimental @<m>DISEASE_Sex_Chromosome_Disorders_of_Sex_Development</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058533 @@@deficiency of sex hormones@@@.

citations.NLM: Voronkov AV, Tiurenkov IN. [Effect of cardiovascular drugs on vasodilating endothelial function in animals with experimental deficiency of sex hormones]. Eksp Klin Farmakol. 2011;74(10):23-5. PMID: 22238982
